text: Grand Canyonscope is a Donald Duck animated short released in 1954. It was Disney's second cartoon filmed in CinemaScope (following Toot, Whistle, Plunk and Boom). It was produced to accompany Disney's first CinemaScope movie 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea. ==Voice cast== * Donald Duck: Clarence Nash * J. Audubon Woodlore: Bill Thompson ==Home media== The short was remastered and also released on November 11, 2008, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Four: 1951â€“1961. It was also released as a bonus feature on the DVD release of 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea. ==Related pages== * List of Disney animated shorts * Donald Duck filmography ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Grand Canyonscope
